verses.verse: "For<WG1063> the Kingdom<WG932> of Heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> like<WG3664> a man<WG444> who was the master<WG3617> of a household,<WG3748> who went out<WG1831> early<WG260> in the morning<WG4404> to hire<WG3409> laborers<WG2040> for<WG1519> his<WG846> vineyard.<WG290>
When<WG1161> he had agreed<WG4856> with<WG3326> the laborers<WG2040> for<WG1537> a denarius<WG1220> a day,<WG2250> he sent<WG649> them<WG846> into<WG1519> his<WG846> vineyard.<WG290>
He<WG2532> went out<WG1831> about<WG4012> the<WG5610> third<WG5154> hour,<WG5610> and saw<WG1492> others<WG243> standing<WG2476> idle<WG692> in<WG1722> the marketplace.<WG58>

To<WG2548> them<WG2036> he said,<WG5210> 'You also<WG2532> go<WG5217> into<WG1519> the vineyard,<WG290> and<WG2532> whatever<WG3739> is<WG5600> right<WG1342> I will give<WG1325> you.<WG5213>' So<WG1161> they went their way.<WG565>
Again<WG3825> he went out<WG1831> about<WG4012> the<WG5610> sixth<WG1623> and<WG2532> the ninth<WG1766> hour,<WG5610> and did<WG4160> likewise.<WG5615>

About<WG4012> the<WG5610> eleventh<WG1734> hour<WG5610> he went out,<WG1831> and<WG2532> found<WG2147> others<WG243> standing<WG2476> idle.<WG692> He said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> <WG5101> 'Why do you<WG2476> stand here<WG5602> all<WG3650> day<WG2250> idle?<WG692>'

"They said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> <WG3754> 'Because no one<WG3762> has hired<WG3409> us.<WG2248>' "He said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> <WG5210> 'You also<WG2532> go<WG5217> into<WG1519> the vineyard,<WG290> and<WG2532> you<WG5210> will receive<WG2983> whatever<WG3739> is<WG5600> right.<WG1342>'

When<WG1096> evening<WG3798> had come,<WG1096> the lord<WG2962> of the vineyard<WG290> said<WG3004> to<WG2012> his<WG846> manager,<WG2012> <WG2564> 'Call the laborers<WG2040> and<WG2532> pay<WG2532> them<WG846> their wages,<WG3408> beginning<WG756> from<WG575> the last<WG2078> to<WG2193> the first.<WG4413>'
"When<WG2532> those<WG3588> who were hired at about<WG4012> the<WG5610> eleventh<WG1734> hour<WG5610> came,<WG2064> they each<WG303> received<WG2983> a denarius.<WG1220>

When<WG2064> the first<WG4413> came,<WG2064> they supposed<WG3543> that<WG3754> they would receive<WG2983> more;<WG4119> and<WG2532> they<WG846> likewise<WG2532> each<WG303> received<WG2983> a denarius.<WG1220>
When<WG1161> they received<WG2983> it,<WG1111> they murmured against<WG2596> the master of the household,<WG3617>

saying,<WG3754> <WG3778> 'These last<WG2078> have spent<WG4160> one<WG1520> hour,<WG5610> and<WG2532> you have made<WG4160> them<WG846> equal<WG2470> to us,<WG2254> who have borne<WG941> the burden<WG922> of the day<WG2250> and<WG2532> the scorching heat!<WG2742>'

"But<WG1161> he answered<WG611> one<WG1520> of them,<WG846> <WG2083> 'Friend, I am doing<WG91> you<WG4571> no<WG3756> wrong.<WG91> Didn't<WG3780> you<WG4571> agree<WG4856> with me<WG3427> for a denarius?<WG1220>

Take<WG142> that which is yours,<WG4674> and<WG2532> go your way.<WG5217> It is my desire<WG2309> to<WG1161> give<WG1325> to<WG2078> this<WG5129> last<WG2078> just<WG2532> as<WG5613> much as to you.<WG4671>

Isn't<WG3756> it<WG1832> lawful<WG1832> for me<WG3427> to do<WG4160> what<WG3739> I want<WG2309> to with<WG1722> what I own?<WG1487> Or is<WG2076> your<WG4675> eye<WG3788> evil,<WG4190> because<WG3754> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> good?<WG18>'

So<WG3779> the last<WG2078> will be<WG2071> first,<WG4413> and<WG2532> the first<WG4413> last.<WG2078> For<WG1063> many<WG4183> are<WG1526> called,<WG2822> but<WG1161> few<WG3641> are chosen.<WG1588>"
As Jesus<WG2424> was going up<WG305> to<WG1519> Jerusalem,<WG2414> he took<WG3880> the twelve<WG1427> disciples<WG3101> aside,<WG2532> and on the way<WG3598> he said<WG2036> to them,<WG846>

"Behold,<WG2400> we are going up<WG305> to<WG1519> Jerusalem,<WG2414> and<WG2532> the Son<WG5207> of Man<WG444> will be delivered<WG3860> to the chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> scribes,<WG1122> and<WG2532> they will condemn<WG2632> him<WG846> to death,<WG2288>

and<WG2532> will hand<WG3860> him<WG846> over to the Gentiles<WG1484> to<WG1519> mock,<WG1702> to<WG2532> scourge,<WG3146> and<WG2532> to crucify;<WG4717> and<WG2532> the<WG2250> third<WG5154> day<WG2250> he will be raised up.<WG450>"

Then<WG5119> the mother<WG3384> of<WG5207> the sons<WG5207> of Zebedee<WG2199> came<WG4334> to him<WG846> with<WG3326> her<WG846> sons,<WG5207> kneeling<WG4352> and<WG2532> asking<WG154> a certain thing<WG5100> of<WG3844> him.<WG846>

He said<WG2036> to her,<WG846> "What<WG5101> do you<WG2309> want?<WG3004>" She said to him,<WG846> "Command that<WG2443> these,<WG3778> my<WG3450> two<WG1417> sons,<WG5207> may sit,<WG2523> one<WG1520> on<WG1537> your<WG4675> right hand,<WG1188> and<WG2532> one<WG1520> on<WG1537> your<WG4675> left<WG2176> hand,<WG1188> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> Kingdom.<WG932>"

But<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered,<WG611> "You don't<WG3756> know<WG1492> what<WG5101> you are asking.<WG154> Are you able<WG1410> to drink<WG4095> the cup<WG4221> that<WG3739> I<WG1473> am<WG3195> about to drink,<WG4095> and<WG2532> be baptized<WG907> with the baptism<WG908> that<WG3739> I<WG1473> am baptized with?<WG907>" They said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "We are able.<WG1410>"

He<WG2532> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "You will indeed<WG3303> drink<WG4095> my<WG3450> cup,<WG4221> and<WG2532> be baptized<WG907> with the baptism<WG908> that<WG3739> I<WG1473> am baptized with,<WG907> but<WG1161> to sit<WG2523> on<WG1537> my<WG3450> right hand<WG1188> and<WG2532> on<WG1537> my<WG3450> left<WG2176> hand is<WG2076> not<WG3756> mine<WG3450> to give;<WG1325> but<WG235> it is for whom<WG3739> it has been prepared<WG2090> by<WG5259> my<WG3450> Father.<WG3962>"
When<WG191> the ten<WG1176> heard<WG191> it,<WG23> they were indignant with<WG4012> the two<WG1417> brothers.<WG80>

But<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> summoned<WG4341> them,<WG846> and said,<WG2036> "You know<WG1492> that<WG3754> the rulers<WG758> of the nations<WG1484> lord it over<WG2634> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> their great<WG3173> ones exercise authority over<WG2715> them.<WG846>

It shall<WG2071> not<WG3756> be<WG2071> so<WG3779> among<WG1722> you,<WG5213> but<WG235> whoever<WG3739> desires to become<WG2309> great<WG3173> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> shall be<WG2309> your<WG5213> servant.<WG1249>
Whoever<WG3739> desires<WG2309> to be<WG1511> first<WG4413> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> shall be<WG1511> your<WG5213> bondservant,<WG1401>

even as<WG5618> the Son<WG5207> of Man<WG444> came<WG2064> not<WG3756> to be served,<WG1247> but<WG235> to serve,<WG1247> and<WG2532> to give<WG1325> his<WG846> life<WG5590> as a ransom<WG3083> for<WG473> many.<WG4183>"
As<WG1607> they<WG846> went<WG1607> out<WG1607> from<WG575> Jericho,<WG2410> a<WG3793> great<WG4183> multitude<WG3793> followed<WG190> him.<WG846>

Behold,<WG2400> two<WG1417> blind men<WG5185> sitting<WG2521> by<WG3844> the road,<WG3598> when they heard<WG191> that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> was passing by,<WG3855> cried out,<WG2896> "Lord,<WG2962> have mercy on<WG1653> us,<WG2248> you son<WG5207> of David!<WG1138>"

The<WG1161> multitude<WG3793> rebuked<WG2008> them,<WG846> telling them<WG2443> that they should be quiet,<WG4623> but<WG1161> they cried<WG2896> out even more,<WG3185> "Lord,<WG2962> have mercy on<WG1653> us,<WG2248> you son<WG5207> of David!<WG1138>"
Jesus<WG2424> stood still,<WG2476> and called<WG5455> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> asked,<WG2036> "What<WG5101> do you<WG2309> want me to do<WG4160> for you?<WG2309>"
They told<WG3004> him,<WG846> "Lord,<WG2962> that<WG2443> our<WG2257> eyes<WG3788> may be opened.<WG455>"

Jesus,<WG2424> being moved with compassion,<WG4697> touched<WG680> their<WG846> eyes;<WG3788> and<WG2532> immediately<WG2112> their<WG846> eyes<WG3788> received their<WG846> sight,<WG308> and<WG2532> they followed<WG190> him.<WG846>
